content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Mamani. I am open to discussing the rental price. How much were you considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Well, I understand that prices can vary, but I'm looking for something that's fair and reasonable. I'm a student, so I'm on a budget, but I'm also very dependable and responsible. I'm willing to pay a fair price for the apartment.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I appreciate your situation, Mr. Mamani. As a landlord, I'm also looking for a tenant who is reliable and will take good care of the apartment. Let's start with a number that I think is fair for the size and location of the apartment. How does 650 Euros per month sound to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: 650 Euros is a bit high for my budget as a student. I was hoping for something more in the range of 500 Euros per month. I'm willing to discuss the terms further if that's acceptable to you.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: 500 Euros is lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to negotiate. How long were you planning to stay in the apartment? Long-term tenants sometimes receive a slight discount.
name: Heinrich Heine
